item.title: How to reset persistent volume status from terminating back to bound.
item.description: TL;DR When delete a kubernetes persistent volume by accident, it may stuck in the terminating status due to kubernetes.io/pv-protection finalizer prevent it from being deleted. You can use this k8s-reset-terminating-pv tool to reset its status back to bound.
